title: Adrenaline
description: Sam Capra is a brilliant CIA agent, loving husband, and soon-to-be father. But in one horrifying moment in London, he will lose everything that matters to him. Targeted by an unknown enemy and branded as a traitor by the CIA, Sam goes on a desperate huntto find a killer and save his kidnapped wife and child. And that's just the The destruction of Sam's life was only step one in an extraordinary plot ... and now Sam must become a new kind of hero. (Bestseller)
author: Jeff Abbott
